backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister implementing authorization, user approvals, and domain types for products, contacts, estimates, purchases, and transactions with admin‑gated approval management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style sheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: PWA-enabled HTML entry point defining metadata, theme color, icons, and root mount container for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precache, runtime cache, and network‑first fetch strategy with cache cleanup and offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling Internet Identity auth, profile setup gating, theme provider, and rendering Login or Dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component displaying an access denied message with optional back navigation using card-based layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminBackupModul: UI for admins to export and import full backup JSON files with validation, BigInt handling, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordMod: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, navigation, and main content area with responsive sidebar and mobile nav.
frontend/src/components/BillingModule.ts: Full billing workflow including estimate creation, editing, payment recording, branding settings, printing, and Bluetooth printer integration.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothPrinter: Dialog explaining Bluetooth printing requirements and generating a printable reference page with styling.
frontend/src/components/ChangePasswordMo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ContactsModule.t: Manages contacts with add, edit, delete dialogs, categorization, and pending amount calculation tied to estimates.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays product, stock, and contact summary metrics with loading states and dashboard cards.
frontend/src/components/EstimatePrintVie: Provides UI and logic for printing estimates via browser or Bluetooth, including thermal formatting and printer connection handling.
frontend/src/components/FinanceModule.ts: Displays finance dashboards and reports with filters and print functionality using various data queries.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with user info, role badge, theme toggle, and logout handling.
Manages product inventory with search, stock updates, and admin-only editing.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePrintView: Empty placeholder component for invoice printing.
frontend/src/components/MobileNumberModa: Empty placeholder component for a mobile number modal.
frontend/src/components/ModulePageHeader: Reusable header component for module pages with title, icon, subtitle, and optional actions.
frontend/src/components/PriceOverrideDia: Modal prompting admin approval when selling price is below cost, showing price details and triggering override callback.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNavigatio: Renders sidebar or bottom navigation with modules, filtering admin‑only items based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProductAutocompl: Searchable popover-based product selector with filtering, highlighting, and selection callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProductsModule.t: CRUD interface for products with validation, dialogs for add/edit/delete, and admin-based access control.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal requiring user to enter and save their display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModule.t: Manages purchase creation and editing with line items, pricing validation, override workflow, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Handles PWA install prompt display, dismissal logic, and triggering installation.
frontend/src/components/SetAdminPassword: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SortControls.tsx: Provides dropdown and toggle button for selecting sort field and direction.
frontend/src/components/UserAccessContro: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor tied to identity, initializes access control, and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBluetoothThermalPr: Provides a React hook for connecting to and printing via Bluetooth thermal printers, managing connection state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including user, product, backup, and role-related operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useThermalQuickPrevie: Manages thermal preview settings with localStorage persistence and update/reset helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard and switches between modules based on user selection and admin role.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/types/web-bluetooth.d.ts: Provides TypeScript interfaces and type definitions for the Web Bluetooth API missing from the standard library.
frontend/src/utils/sort.ts: Implements basic comparison helpers for strings, numbers, bigints, and dates plus a utility to apply sorting after filtering.
frontend/src/utils/thermalQuickPreview.t: Defines thermal preview settings and utilities to generate CSS styles for on-screen and print previews of receipts.
frontend/src/utils/thermalReceiptEncodin: Builds ESC/POS command sequences to encode thermal receipt content based on printer settings and provided data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with fallback to sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, border radii, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project architecture, features, issues, and versioned internal state.
